>
[Beastmaster's Trance](/Feats.aspx?ID=6270) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 188 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Beastmaster](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=241)

**Prerequisites**
[Beastmaster Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6267)

</column>

---

You can enter a trance that allows you to briefly inhabit the body of one of your animal companions and share its senses. You gain the focus spell [_beastmaster trance_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1962).
